patthana14.18:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.18:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.18:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nanoanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.18:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
